mapper.select: select mem_name, mem_phone, mem_address from member where gym_code=#{gym_code} and authority='ROLE_ADMIN_SUB'

select gym_scale, facility_parking, facility_health, facility_yoga, facility_gx, facility_pilates, facility_pt, facility_24hour, facility_shower, facility_wear, facility_locker from GYM_DETAIL where gym_code=#{gym_code}

SELECT OD.order_idx,O.order_name,O.order_status,O.order_date FROM pay_log P INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM order_log WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}) O ON P.order_idx=O.order_idx INNER JOIN order_log_detail OD ON O.order_idx=OD.order_idx GROUP BY OD.order_idx,O.order_name,O.order_status,O.order_date
SELECT * FROM pay_log P INNER JOIN order_log O ON P.order_idx=O.order_idx INNER JOIN order_log_detail OD ON O.order_idx=OD.order_idx WHERE O.order_idx=#{order_idx}
SELECT * FROM pay_log P INNER JOIN order_log O ON P.order_idx=O.order_idx WHERE P.order_idx=#{order_idx}
